alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong West Winds... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riveton. * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph. Localized wind gusts between 60 and 65 mph possible around Clark. * WHERE...Cody Foothills roughly from about 10 miles south of Cody, north to around Clark. The strongest wind is expected just south of Clark to the junction of Highway 120 and the Chief Joseph Highway. * WHEN...The strongest winds are expected between 8 PM and 2 AM tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be control issues for lightweight and high-profile vechiles especially along Highway 120. In a parking log, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
